text: Tyler Jeffrey Dillashaw born February 7, 1986 in Sonora, California. Is an American mixed martial artist. He is competing at the flyweight and bantamweight division of the Ultimate Fighting Championship. He is a former two-time UFC Bantamweight Champion. == References == == Other websites == * T.J Dillashaw Profile at UFC.com * * * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:American mixed martial artists Category:Sportspeople from California
title: T.J. Dillashaw
